title: New Rammus lore
body: The new Rammus lore is absolutely amazing. I honestly couldn't stop laughing while reading it. "What is Rammus? Nobody know!" He just kinda appears and does things and people like him. Absolutely hilarious! Whoever wrote the story, great job! <3

replies.body: Ahh true that. I love the fact that he is implied to be an ascented and even as old as Skarner and the last of a dying race. Seriously, he is kicking ass and trolling people so well and it fits so well with his character, now that the Institute of war is no more.
I love the line "One person even thought he was sleeprolling"
True, When Rammus Rolls. Shit is going down.
Yeah.

OK
Yo wth this is Memes & games wtf else r we gonna do but troll and meme in the context of games
lol, why
Because someone will get their ass kicked. Crazy mages with horrific monsters, Noxian armies and Hordes of Kmiros. All got their asses handed by Rammus.

I mean why the 
Rammus profile
I don't know, but praise the lord and savior, he is finally come. Just don't make any idols of him.
Every champion in the game has a summoner profile on every region. This has been a thing for a long, long time.
Since when?
Since forever ago. Go look them up yourself, though be warned some champs have specific ways of spelling their summoner names, like Velkoz instead of Vel'Koz.

Hm hm.
okay
Uh-huh.

Ok*

FTFY

Brilliant response. Way to pay attention to posts about crap that doesn't matter when you have so many posts daily with concerns from players about thinks like tank ekko.

We want be kept in the loop with the though process.  Whether or no you think you (Riot) has stated their position on a given subject, there are always new players, or old players returning that don't know what you think about thinks that are upsetting lots of players.

Your communication with your customers should be a very consistent and address their concerns.  I'm so sick of seeing Riot reply only to safe posts that aren't criticizing or critiquing a champion design or change.
I would pay money to see a large group of people somersaulting through a city.
YEAH
This was the perfect time you shouldve said ok, but no you killed it.
Nah. Yeah is ok.
The description is "The Armordillo" confirmed he roles around rito hq and says 'Ok'
Yeah?
alright

Oh damn it's the real Rammus. Let me try to communicate. 

"Ok".
WE NEED THIS RIOT!
Get hit by a Rolling Rammus and you will roll too. In the sky and land with a broken neck.

I love this lore for Rammus. It's so hilarious seeing him saving the day and everybody praising him, when in reality, it's simply coincidence that he saves them as he tries to eat something. I wish they actually made Amumu have lore instead of having it similar to this. It really works well for Rammus, but not for Amumu.

This is one of my fears when they go to update {{champion:62}}'s lore. Sure this works great for Ramus, being a great mix of comedy and making details on him intentionally vague, but not many champs benefit from that kind of vague storytelling. I can sort of understand {{champion:32}} having a vague story since no one can get close enough to him to learn his true history (hens why it his lore is mostly legends about him), but when it comes to Champs like {{champion:24}} and {{champion:62}} who people can get to know, they should have a fully flushed out stories.

After so many sob stories about betrayal, heartbreak and loneliness, It's refreshing to have a good hilarious lore pop up that pretty much says "we don't know what Rammus is, but he's f**king amazing, so we should worship him". great work lore team, can't wait to see what place will be updated next :D

I just LOVE how this dopey armordillo who rolls around is regarded as a prophet and a GOD among Shuriman peoples. 
I can't wait to see where he pops up next!
I think his lore is OK.
Rammus is Mad Max: confirmed. He's a mysterious desert hero who only says a few words.

Ehhhhhhhh i dont want to nitpick, but i feel like rammus and amumu are falling into the lazy lore category...
Not that its super bad, but having 2 champs whose lore is 'i dunno' in one faction isnt super awesome either.

I was really hoping for amumu to get some clarification over the yordle or human thing, as i think a human child emperor with a sad fate is really fertile ground to build up the story of ancient shurima and offer a window to the ancient past.
Not dissing the lore, i just like clarity. i really hope they dont do this with evelynn (as her current lore is idfk)

have to admit that rammus fits that "WTF?" lore perfectly, hes a magical armordillo, not knowing what he is is kind of awesome and feels better to not explore as you can invent whatever lore you want and hes kind of just this wild animal anywho, amumu on the other hand has a personality and character that could be really deep if riot decided to explore it
"Mysterious for mysterious reasons" is still a piece of dung even if it is painted golden.

Do not go "unlucky" get "ok"

ok.

I feel quite the opposite.
It feels like the entire thing has no substance what so ever. Just empty text that even a high school student at humanities could do.
Meh, whatever, each with their own
Tbh I hate the fact lore was changed but whatever, I have no plans to read lore anymore I'm just scared Riot will change it.
